caseTitle: Ghulam Mustafa Lund v. National Accountability Bureau, thr. its Chairman, Islamabad & others
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Hasan Azhar Rizvi
tagline: (1) The Accountability Court has no jurisdiction to direct an Investigating Officer to re-assess or re-value the Voluntary Return liability of the petitioner; this prerogative lies exclusively with the Chairman NAB. (2) It is imperative to ensure that no NAB officer resorts to duress, coercion, or threats to obtain a commitment of 'voluntary return' from a person under inquiry as stipulated under section 25(a) of NAO, 1999.
